title: FS: 17 Raw T206 - MOVED TO EBAY

posts.post_title: FS: 17 Raw T206 - MOVED TO EBAY
posts.post_content:
Some of these have been offered before, but some are new.  I've lowered the price of many of the cards that were previously offered.  Paypal preferred.  Add $2 for any shipment under $20.  Scans available at: 
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/raw-for-sale[/url]
